title: Client Problems
body:
i played about 7 butcher's bridge games today and none of them appears @ my match history 
and when i click claim rewards i don't see what i did stack @ 0/25000 gold  (twisted fate icon) and 0/50 assists  
i restarted my client many times and still having the same problem
so if there is anything i can do plz tell me
should i just leave it? or maybe i repair my client? idk plz help and i will realy appreciate it 
gl hf people xD

replies.body:
Hey HATCHIEPI,

I think Riot may have already resolved this issue; as such, I'm just checking in to see whether you're still having problems. Have the stats updated yet?
yep it works better now and every thing goes well
i tried to visit the site and see the match history online but it didn't work . also tried to see my friends match history also didnt work -________-
